Name: Heatris
About the game: For those who want to play a puzzle with time where it will require patience, you can choose the image and the level of difficulty. Drag the pieces from right to left placing in the exact place without dropping the piece because you will lose the game, if you want to change pieces you have to drag again to the right side. Featuring: You have to drag the right piece from where the pieces fall to the left where the board is. You can choose the difficulty levels and the image
